lead_paragraph: The state said it would seek a review by the Connecticut Supreme Court of a judge’s order to revamp the education system to address inequality among districts.

headline.print_headline: Connecticut to Appeal Judge’s Order to Overhaul Its Education System
headline.main: Connecticut to Appeal Decision in Schools Funding Case

snippet: The state said it would seek a review by the Connecticut Supreme Court of a judge’s order to revamp the education system to address inequality among districts....
abstract: State of Conn says it will appeal ruling by Judge Thomas G Moukawsher of State Superior Court in Hartford that required virtually complete overhaul of educational system and accused state of defaulting on constitutional duty to provide adequate education to all children; State Atty Gen George C Jepsen says there is evidence that Moukawsher exceeded his authority, and asks for review of ruling.
